articles.author: Nicole Wetsman
articles.title: FDA clears Withings’ EKG and blood oxygen features - The Verge
articles.description: The Withings ScanWatch now has FDA clearance to detect abnormal heart rhythms and blood oxygen levels. It says it can detect disturbances that may indicate sleep apnea.
articles.content:
The ScanWatch can detect breathing disturbances during the night
Photo by Amelia Holowaty Krales / The Verge
After over a year in limbo, Withings finally has Food and Drug Administration clearance … [+2403 chars]

articles.author: Nilay Patel
articles.title: How Amazon runs Alexa, with Dave Limp - The Verge
articles.description: Dave Limp is in charge of Alexa, Ring, and Eero. He talks about how he fosters relationships between his teams and how the Astro robot came to be.
articles.content: My guest today is Dave Limp, the SVP of devices and services at Amazon or, more simply, the guy in charge of Alexa. Daves group at Amazon also includes the Kindle e-reader, the Ring and Blink securit… [+64189 chars]
